com.zodoto.util.ducks

Class DuckSocketThread

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Thread
      • com.zodoto.util.ducks.DuckSocketThread
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class DuckSocketThread
extends java.lang.Thread
    Receives a single request, contacts the local control for the next set of keys, and returns them
    Author:
    Pete Guard
